     dropout_desc_name = 'desc_' + str(torch.cuda.current_device())

     if (dropout_desc_name not in dropout_state) or (dropout_state[dropout_desc_name].get() is None):
         dropout_state[dropout_desc_name] = Unserializable(

body: I was under the impression that `torch.backends.cudnn.rnn` was private. If it wasn't, I've got a lot more things I've got to bring back...
